mapper.insert: insert into bu.wq_professor_course_review (professor_id, course_id, create_by, quality_score, difficult_score, number_of_exams, number_of_quizzes, number_of_homeworks, number_of_projects, number_of_papers, grade_received, tag, comment, anonymous, using_textbook, attendance) values (#{professorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qualityScore,jdbcType=REAL}, #{difficultScore,jdbcType=REAL}, #{numberOfExams,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{numberOfQuizzes,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{numberOfHomeworks,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{numberOfProjects,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{numberOfPapers,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{gradeReceived,jdbcType=REAL}, #{tag,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anonymous,jdbcType=BIT}, #{usingTextbook,jdbcType=BIT}, #{attendance,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update bu.wq_professor_course_review set professor_id = #{professorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quality_score = #{qualityScore,jdbcType=REAL}, difficult_score = #{difficultScore,jdbcType=REAL}, number_of_exams = #{numberOfExams,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, number_of_quizzes = #{numberOfQuizzes,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, number_of_homeworks = #{numberOfHomeworks,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, number_of_projects = #{numberOfProjects,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, number_of_papers = #{numberOfPapers,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, grade_received = #{gradeReceived,jdbcType=REAL}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, anonymous = #{anonymous,jdbcType=BIT}, using_textbook = #{usingTextbook,jdbcType=BIT}, attendance = #{attendance,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, professor_id, course_id, create_by, quality_score, difficult_score, number_of_exams, number_of_quizzes, number_of_homeworks, number_of_projects, number_of_papers, grade_received, tag, comment, anonymous, using_textbook, attendance from bu.wq_professor_course_review where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
